name: Vellista
description:
Title: Vellista

Creator: Summer Holmes

Platform: PC

Genre: Adventure

Rating: E 

Target Market: Teens

Game/Project Overview: Mini level to show off my first original rigged 3D humanoid character. 

Published/Updated Date: May 9th, 2021

Instructions: Use Mouse to move camera and WASD/Arrow Keys to move (click in game if needed)
